## JWT.claims() method

Extracts a claims set from the JSON Web Token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static claims(jwt: JSONWebToken): ClaimSet;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  jwt | <code>JSONWebToken</code> | a JSON Web Token string. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ClaimSet`

a claims set.
